item.title: Multiplexing gRPC and HTTP (Prometheus) endpoints with Cloud Run
item.description: Google Cloud Run is useful but, each service is limited to exposing a single port. This caused me problems with a gRPC service that serves (non-gRPC) Prometheus metrics because customarily, you would serve gRPC on one port and the Prometheus metrics on another. Fortunately, cmux provides a solution by providing a mechanism that multiplexes both services (gRPC and HTTP) on a single port! TL;DR See the cmux Limitations and use:
